data.speaker: Teacher

data.text: "Bow wow! I'm Stamp, the good boy who never stops helping!"
data.speaker: Teacher

data.text: "Cap'n's given me a very important mission: to buy bread for tonight's dinner!"
data.speaker: Teacher

data.text: So with his super-duper nose, Stamp went into town to sniff out a bakery.
data.speaker: Teacher

data.text: He went a-sniff-sniff here, and a-sniff-sniff there!
data.speaker: Teacher

data.text: Even finding milk, sausage, and cake didn't distract him.
data.speaker: Teacher

data.text: Using his trusty nose, Stamp was able to find the best, most yummiest bakery in the whole city!
data.speaker: Teacher

data.text: And from that bakery, he picked out the best, most yummiest-smelling loaf of bread!
data.speaker: Teacher

data.text: Thinking about how pleased the captain would be, Stamp went trotting back to base, wagging his tail, and singing a happy song.
data.speaker: Teacher

data.text: But on the road home, he came across a moogle crying all by himself.
data.speaker: Teacher

data.text: "What's wrong?" Stamp asked the forlorn little fellow.
data.speaker: Teacher

data.text: "I'm so hungry. I haven't eaten in ages, kupo," the moogle sniffled.
data.speaker: Teacher

data.text: "Never fear, Stamp's here! And I know just how to help."
data.speaker: Teacher

data.text: So Stamp gave the crying moogle his loaf of bread.
data.speaker: Teacher

data.text: "Thank you, kupo," the moogle exclaimed, his pom bouncing excitedly.
data.speaker: Teacher

data.text: Then Stamp waved goodbye and returned to base.
data.speaker: Teacher

data.text: When he got there, he went straight to the captain and told him what had happened.
data.speaker: Teacher

data.text: The captain was very proud of Stamp. Helping that moogle was the right thing to do.
data.speaker: Teacher

data.text: "Who's a good boy," the captain laughed, as he gave Stamp a good scratch behind the ears.
data.speaker: Teacher

data.text: And Stamp let out a happy bark, for he knew that he was the good boy.
data.speaker: Teacher

data.text: The end.

Shoulda known they'd be behind this.
They're just mad they don't have their own reactors, so they're taking it out on us.
Come to think of it, how do they even live without mako energy anyway?
Not well, I bet. They act all proud, but life there has to be miserable.
So they decide not to use mako, then they get mad that we have better lives than them? Seriously?
Shinra invaded Wutai first. It's only natural that they'd fight back.
And they're doing this for the environment. Hard not to sympathize with 'em.
Hey! You two got a death wish or somethin'? Stop running your mouths!
You never know who could be listening.
You'd think Shinra would try to be a little more subtle about all this.
Right? If people took two seconds to think about it, they'd realize the news was nothing but a pack of lies.
But it's what people wanna hear, and so they believe it.
They'd rather live in blissful ignorance than question everything they know about Shinra.
When are those Avalanche assholes gonna stop terrorizing our city?
They say they wanna save the planet, but what good will blowing things up do?
None, that's what. Especially when repairs on Reactor 5 have already started.
Sounds like if they really want to change anything, they should start with how people think about the environment.
You think Avalanche pays its members?
At this point, I'll work for just about anyone.
Jackpot! I'll be rollin' in gil!
I'm gonna sell you and buy her some awesome food!
I'll be the best big brother ever!
Now get out of there right nooow!
You hear the news? Apparently, we're going to war.
War, huh? Know what that means, right? Demand for metal's gonna go through the roof.
Then I say we get in on the ground floor!
I'm gonna enjoy watching this war turn the plate into one big slum.
You and me both.
With all the bombs going off, I wouldn't be surprised if some scrap from the plate made its way down here.
Talk about a windfall!  We're gonna be swimming─no, drowning in money!
Buried, you mean. We're talking about shit falling from the sky here!
Wasn't there someone from Wutai working at that bar?
No...really?
We should tell the authorities. You never know; they might be a spy.
Um... Sir? What are we going to do?
data.speaker: New Recruit

data.text: We're going to concentrate on our jobs, and not worry about things that don't concern us.
data.speaker: Senior Officer

data.text: But...what if Avalanche is hiding somewhere in this sector?
data.speaker: New Recruit

data.text: I know a guy stationed in Sector 4 who's been transferred to Sector 5.
data.speaker: New Recruit

data.text: Not surprising. 5's been hit hard.
data.speaker: Senior Officer

data.text: So...if this keeps up, what's gonna happen to us?
data.speaker: New Recruit

data.text: Nothing! Do you think Shinra─the most powerful organization in the world─
data.speaker: Senior Officer

data.text: is gonna let some Wutai-backed terrorists bring 'em down!?
data.speaker: Senior Officer

data.text: N-no! No, sir!
data.speaker: New Recruit

data.text: I heard that one of the suspects was apprehended...
data.speaker: New Recruit

data.text: You heard right.
data.speaker: Senior Officer

data.text: Word is they took him to the pillar, but why there?
data.speaker: New Recruit

data.text: Because they wanted to have a chat with him somewhere they wouldn't be disturbed.
data.speaker: Senior Officer

data.text: A chat? Really?
data.speaker: New Recruit

data.text: Yeah. A nice, long one.
data.speaker: Senior Officer

data.text: Wh-what is it?
data.speaker: New Recruit

data.text: I can't help but think Reactor 7's next.
data.speaker: New Recruit

data.text: What? You lost or somethin'?
data.speaker: Senior Officer

data.text: Get the hell outta my face, brat.
data.speaker: Senior Officer

data.text: Stay alert now!
Don't get yourself hurt.
Hey there!
Now I know we'll be safe.
Watch that fight yesterday?
The─what was it again? Airbuster? Was so cool.
I can't even imagine what life would be like without mako now.
Long live mako!
After all this, no way Avalanche is gonna pack it up.
Only a matter of time before they hit another reactor.
How could Shinra let this happen? They knew Reactor 5 was the target.
And here I thought they had everything under control.
Looks like we're going to war with Wutai again.
If there is a war, I just hope the fighting's over there.
They've got those "ninja" guys in Wutai, right?
'Cause I keep thinking... What if they're already among us?
Wutai... Why's that name ring a bell?
I know it has something to do with that war, but what exactly?
I can't believe this. One of my friends lives in Sector 5.
Maybe I should invite them to come stay with me for a while.
Avalanche's only going after reactors, right?
Meaning we should be safe down here on the surface.
Those topsiders are gonna have quite the time making do without mako.
Serves 'em right, I say.
We can't go on living in fear like this.
Shinra needs to do something about those terrorists.
Did you hear about any new developments?
I wonder if the Sector 7 reactor really is next on their list.
Shinra's not just going to stand by and let a third reactor be destroyed.
Avalanche will be brought to justice, you mark my words.
I thought I'd gotten used to living under the plate, but now I'm not sure I ever will.
All this stuff─it's going on right above our heads!
Just thinking how the plate might come crashing down...I can barely breathe.
So have you heard any news about the Sector 5 undercity?
Not much. Pretty sure the trains aren't running, but otherwise it's business as usual.
I guess that means they're safe for at least a bit longer.
To look at things from down here, you'd never guess what had gone on up top.
Must be some really good steel they used if the plate can take that kind of a beating.
Imagine getting those beams all the way up there in the first place... Bet that was a task.
You gotta hand it to them... Shinra really knows how to build stuff.
Hey, do you know what war is?
I don't, but it sounds scary.
You think having two of the reactors down is gonna affect us at all?
Maybe they'll start cutting power to the slums or have brownouts.
I wouldn't put it past them...
I heard the suns over in 4 got turned off, and the whole sector's been dark ever since.
Makes sense. Those things are massive. Must suck up a ton of power.
Might be be a good idea to prepare for the worst.
Prepare how?
By stocking up on food and water, for starters. And some fuel couldn't hurt either.
Know what I say? We start salvaging while everyone else is in shock.
Good thinking. With no supplies coming in, people will just have to make do with scrap.
So we get to it first, and make a killing.
Let's hope Avalanche keeps stirring the pot a little longer.
Yeah, at least until we've cleaned this place out.
Maybe we should move back to the country after all.
And give up on your dream of living on the plate?
Either way, moving costs money.
So what, we should stay in the slums for the rest of our lives?
I don't mind. I like it here.
Alright, I brought those nails and screws you wanted. Now can I please have a job?
I said I'd think about it─and my answer's "no." There's no future for you in this kinda business.
But without a job, I've got not future at all!
Fine, fine. I'll give you a chance.
Really!? You will!?
Yeah, but you're gonna wish I hadn't.
Bring it on, old man!
Hey, wasn't that Scarlet just now? From the Advanced Weaponry Division?
What a head-turner.
The damage there looked much worse than it did at Reactor 1.
Guess there won't be any trains running today either.
How do they expect us to live under these conditions?
First Heidegger, now Scarlet? Some big names on TV.
Wouldn't wanna be a Shinra exec right now. No way, no how.
I guarantee she's married to her job.
She's beautiful, I'll give her that, but hearing her talk, you can tell she's an absolute bitch.
Are they going to show anything besides the reactor?
So...did the same people who blew up Reactor 1 do this?
Can any old person really make a "device" like that?
According to officials involved with the ongoing investigation...
the bombers are believed to have gone into hiding somewhere far from the site of the attacks.
A large-scale search led by military forces is currently being planned.
Furthermore, initial reports confirm that terrorists were coordinating their efforts with Wutai─
a revelation that has left many citizens shaken.
Anti-Wutai sentiment has reached a fever pitch in the city as more information about their involvement comes to light...
and amid this growing hostility, many believe that war is inevitable.
These citizens are already gathering in Sector 2 for President Shinra's upcoming speech...
hoping it will include a declaration of war.
You don't think those terrorists could be lying low down here, do you?
Avalanche and Wutai? Talk about a match made in hell...
We gotta hit them before they hit us!
Does Wutai really think it stands a chance?
So...what? Wutai's been calling the shots all along?
Are they...really going to start another war already?
Uh, what's a "Wutai"?
I don't get it. Why don't they make up and be friends again?
Wonder what they got up to with those bikes.
They wouldn't just take off with them, would they?
Naw, they'll definitely be back.
It's probably the trains keeping them from going topside to pick 'em up.
I don't know. What if they just forgot?
Kinda surprised Johnny hasn't come crawling back yet.
Well, I did hear him say something about stopping by Wall Market for one last hurrah.
What!?
That bastard's at the Honeybee Inn, I just know it.
Should we go get him?
Naw, better not. He's probably getting all "philosophical" as we speak.
What's that mean?
Should we even be shopping at a time like this?
Of course we should. We can't let them keep us from living our lives.
So, you gonna buy anything?
Hmmm... No. This stuff's nothing compared to what I can get topside.
Top-notch quality at rock-bottom prices!
These are dark times, but there's nothing like a new outfit to brighten your day!
Care to look at our selection, young lady? You're sure to find something you like.
My oh my... I can't remember the last time I saw clothes like yours around here.
You topsiders certainly are fashion forward, aren't you.
How'd you like to try on the latest undercity trends?
Honestly, how can you not think Tifa's better?
The way she smiles when she hands you your drink... That's why it's called Seventh Heaven!
What he said.
You don't get it at all.
Jessie's got a heckuva lot more going for her than a cute smile!
Agreed! You remember when I was having a tough time of it a few months ago?
She slapped me on the back so hard, knocked me right outta my slump.
I've been a proud member of Team Jessie ever since!
But ever since he showed up...
Hey... We said we wouldn't talk about this.
The merc, right?
What did I just say!?
I mean, where does he get off taking both of 'em from us!?
Look, the important thing...is that they're happy.
This is...heavier than it looked...!
You can do it, Daddy!
If it's too heavy, I can help you!
Thanks, honey...but I've got it.
Alright, girls. We have to stay calm and prioritize.
What provisions do we actually need?
Whoa there. I asked one of the stores, and they said they have enough food and essentials for a while.
That may be─but what if people start hoarding them?
There'll be none left for us!
If we wanna survive, we have to get to the stores now!
Didn't one of you say something about "staying calm"?
Sure am glad I didn't put off ordering all that stuff through Sam's.
Yeah, me too. It should be more than enough to tide us over until the trains are running again.
I dunno... What if people start panic buying?
Then we limit the number of items per customer.
We proudly carry Fort Condor!
Get your hands on the board game sensation!
Hurry, hurry, 'cause they're going fast!
Don't be the only one on your block without one!
Go all out, Go all out, Go all out, little Stamp.
You'll do all you can, 'cause you're the best, Stamp!
Bow-wow-wow, bow-wow-wow...
Fight for us, Fight for us, Fight for us, little Stamp.
You're justice on four legs and you're the hero that we need.
I scream, you scream...
We all scream for ice cream!
Make sure to eat it before it melts. I don't want any sticky hands while we're out shopping.
So, what are we gonna buy today?
Lots of different things─to make sure we're prepared for whatever happens. Like groceries and toilet paper.
And new toys?
No toys.
So, was drinking your whole day away worth it, ya think?
No. No, it wasn't.
And did spending all our gil on booze make you happy?
No. It didn't.
Oh well, so much for Seventh Heaven opening...
Not that I'm surprised, after what went down yesterday.
What a relief. Those thugs are nowhere to be seen.
I got so sick of them hanging around the bar, scaring everybody off. I was starting to think I might never get to go in again.
What!? Nooo... It can't be closed!
Seventh Heaven's my happy place!
You're gonna wanna hear this.
So last week, went head to head with Billy Bob in a drinking competition, right?
You still do that stuff? C'mon.
And what? You completely wiped the floor with him?
Nope. Totally drank me under the table!
Should've seen him. Total beast. Kept knocking 'em back, and never so much as burped!
Whoa, you lost?
Whadja say the guy's name was again? Billy Bob, yeah?
So, get this: the Don Corneo's been sending talent scouts down here.
Ugh, I know. They already got to me.
Yeah, same here. Weren't they just the worst?
All that bullshit about "living in the lap of luxury"! Honestly, they must think we were born yesterday.
Right? If the man was serious, he wouldn't be sending out total nobodies.
You mean they weren't under orders from "people of influence"?
Meant to ask, did those scout guys say anything...I dunno...odd?
Besides everything? Well, they were talking about what kinda outfit I'd look good in. The choices were "exotic," "sporty," or "refined."
Well, who understands those Wall Market people.
Seriously, though─what would you do if you were picked?
Oh, that's easy. Make the don buy me a mansion topside! God knows he can afford it.
Please, with that kind of money, you could buy at least two! What am I saying? Three!
I'm about to keel over.
Last night was a bust. This bombing shit isn't good for the club scene.
This ain't no place for kids. Beat it.
If war breaks out, you just know the clubs'll be the first to close.
Which means I'm officially anti-war.
I'm gonna crash. Wake me up when it's time to party.
A'ight, pro'ly oughta head over to the Honeybee before the line gets too long.
You can skip a day, ya know?
Why would I? Gotta live for the moment and all that. Shit could hit the fan any second!
They'll need troopers if they're planning on going to war. Wonder if I could enlist.
What? This ain't no show─get lost.
Hey girly. Back it up. Kids aren't exactly welcome here.
Trust me, you don't wanna hang around. Now move it along.
Hey. Got the latest in Shinra-brand goods.
These are the real deal, kid. No knock-offs here.
The hell? Is this blood?
Oh, that? Nah, that's a wine stain.
Pretty sure it's blood.
C'mon, would I lie?
Well, whatever it is, it's a stain, so...
'Fraid I can't give you a discount, but what if I throw in this teakettle for free?
Ya'll are in luck, lemme tell ya!
Got a copy of Fort Condor in stock. But just the one!
Oh, me! Sell it to me!
Screw him. Give ya 100 for it!
Screw you! Two-hundred!
Three-hundred!
I'll do five!
That all it's worth to you? Who knows when it'll be back in stock...?
Just look at 'em, gouging prices.
Heh, you didn't hear this from me, but the set he's selling's fake.
This'll be done before the day's out, no problem.
And come tomorrow, it'll look good as new.
How's it lookin' up there? Figured out what the problem is?
Hey! Ya hear me!?
How many hours has he been up there now?
Hey! Let's take five, man!
I, uh...hit up Culvert Street last night.
What? Alone? And you made it out alive?
Yeah, but they took everything I had.
It isn't fair, dammit! I've really been trying to save up.
How much did they get outta you?
I don't wanna talk about it...
Did you hear about the Loveless musical? Canceled! Can you believe that!?
After everything that's happened? You bet I can.
Oh, if I ever meet one of those Avalanche thugs...!
Do you have any idea how much these tickets cost me!?
Then ask the theater for your money back.
But that's just it! I can't get to the theater, can I!?
No way up, meaning it's another jobless day on the ground floor.
Something tells me there'll be a lot more if Avalanche carries on the way it has.
Whatever. I'm done thinking about it. Let's go for drinks tonight!
Where? Seventh Heaven?
Could do. Or we could try another sector?
With the way things are, might be best to find a second job down here─far away from the reactors.
"Down here"? Get real. Jobs don't grow on trees, you know. Not that there are any trees.
Anyway...we can always come back to this once we've got a few drinks in us.
Howdy, young lady! How's about some chili beans?
Nothin' beats a pipin'-hot bowl with a generous helping of cheese!
Three days in a row, drunk off our faces in the middle of the day.
We're cream'a the crop.
Reactors blowin' up left 'n' right... Where's it gonna end?
...Beats me. Don't know who's gonna fall over first, us or Midgar.
Wait, you're back again?
Couldn't stay away. Food up top's got nothing on this place.
Come off it. You came all the way down here just for that?
I swear to you─the grub's just better down here, less pretentious.
Real cute, but flattery's not gonna get you a discount.
We're your one-stop Sector 7 shop!
You there, young lady!
Why not take a look while we're still fully stocked?
We're remodeling the place.
Been living here a while, but that doesn't mean it has to look like it!
Hey, do you think Avalanche are a bunch of platies, or grounders like us?
Hell if I know, but it'd be a lot easier to hide down here.
If Avalanche really are grounders, though, shouldn't we be supporting 'em?
You do know we need the reactors, too, yeah? They're not just for platies.
Yeah, right. Keep telling yourself that.
I heard that Wutai's behind the bombings.
Sounds about right. Those savages don't know when they're beaten.
I bet you they're getting Avalanche to soften us up, ready for them to waltz in and take the city.
Don't be ridiculous. Shinra would never let that happen!
This is a state of emergency! Wutai's practically on our doorstep!
We must prepare for war─and quickly!
If there are shortages, think they'll turn the power off on us?
They wouldn't! ...Would they?
I doubt it'll come to that─at least for us. The Sector 7 reactor's still up and running.
Wutai doesn't have any reactors, right?
I'd be surprised if they did. They hated them enough to go to war, after all.
Crazy. Can you imagine living without mako?
You see the way that reactor blew? God damn... The hell is Shinra doing?
Heard there was some kinda big robot guarding it, too.
Bet you anything Wutai was involved. Ninjas, most likely...
Ninjas, y'say? Now that's a scary thought.
Sure is. If they're anything like the stories ya told.
Now hold on a minute. You tellin' me you've seen a ninja?
Long time ago, yeah, during the war. Wearin' a getup just like that young lady there, funnily enough.
Wait, are you serious!?
Hate to think how much these bombings will have riled up the monsters.
Neighborhood watch's got their work cut out for them.
Hope they can keep things under control.
Sector 5 must be an absolute mess right now.
Maybe I'll go see if everyone's okay.
Haven't seen you around here before. Looking for a place to crash?
I would recommend Stargazer Heights, but they're full up at the moment.
Y'know the landlady Marle? She's an expert on matters of the heart.
Lemme guess, you're here to see her, too?
I talked it out with Marle earlier. Decided it was time to cut that dead weight loose.
Finally! That guy was such a parasite.
He really was. He didn't want a girlfriend─he wanted a second mom!
I never should've given him an allowance...
So what, Marle chewed you out, told ya to dump the guy?
Oh, no. That's not her MO.
Marle doesn't tell you what to do. She just...gives you a nudge in the right direction.
Huh, maybe I'll try her, see what she has to say.
Oh yeah, nearly forgot: she eats men alive.
Just try not to cry, okay?
O...kay?
W-wait, did you just come from...!?
Any monster troubles, or...?
The bombings must've freaked the monsters out.
Guess you can say the same thing about the human population.
Monsters've been actin' strange since the bombings.
Don't go letting your guard down, okay?
These reactor bombings've really spooked the fiend population 'round here.
Just wish they wouldn't take it out on us.
Can't keep cancelin' trains like this...
How else're we supposed to get shipments down here? Parachute 'em?
I'm telling you, what we need to do is reach out to the other sectors.
Set up some kinda trade network─one just for us grounders.
I mean, each sector may not have much...but collectively?
Question is, though, how would we handle transport? Think Sam'd be willing to chip in?
You've heard about Corneo's bridal auditions, right?
Ugh, yes, unfortunately.
They're scouting for candidates right here, in our own backyard!
Gotta tell everyone we know to stay away from those Wall Market creeps.
That, or kick their asses ourselves!
What's gonna happen to our town?
Nothing, because you and I are gonna protect it, no matter what.
Hey, lady, are you lost or somethin'?
If you're ever lost, stay put. That's lesson two for life on the ground floor!
Wait... Maybe it was lesson three?
Look at me, I'm helping the neighborhood watch!
I'm keeping a super close watch out for any weirdos or baddies!
Drop down. Stand up. Get ripped!
Gotta! Get! Bulging! Biceps!
No more...flab...just mythril...abs!
Just...500 more...then I'll...ask...Jessie out!
Who needs fun...when you've got guns!
Destruction and rebirth: the mantra of muscle growth!
Know what I heard? Guns're useless against Wutai's ninjas.
Shut up.
For real. You just can't hit 'em!
The way the vets tell it, ninjas're just as tough as our SOLDIERs.
Ah, come off it. We crushed those guys, remember?
Seriously hope the bombing hasn't sent a buncha new monsters our way.
We may not have the bullets to fend 'em off.
Is it true what they're saying? That even the platies are starting to go hungry?
I just wish we knew more.
This here's the headquarters of the neighborhood watch.
What? You thinkin' about joining the ranks?
People around these parts call this place the "Beginner's Hall."
Everyone's welcome, even greenhorns like you.
Never even occurred to me Wutai could be behind all this.
I was on the frontlines, you know, deep in Wutaian territory. Place's beautiful. Lots of trees.
And when I think about what we did to them. Can hardly blame 'em for hating us.
War's a-comin', people! Need to be armed and ready!
Whether you're a rook or a merc, we got weapons that work!
Stock up on anything you need! Food, provisions, weapons, and more!
You see that merc around?
Come to think of it, no, uh, not today.
He must've found a gig.
I guess. Pity, though. Was nice havin' someone that tough waiting in the wings.
Yeah, the guy was a powerhouse.
Look at that. They blew it up, easy as you please.
Some military Shinra's got, huh.
Not gonna be good for any of us if Wutai's got their claws in this.
They send their ninjas in, we're gonna be in big trouble.
Think they'll start sendin' us grounders draft papers when war breaks out?
Guess it wouldn't be the end of the world. Not like I got a job.
If these bombings keep up, food prices are gonna go through the roof.
Just gotta figure out a way to get in on the action.
First Sector 1, now 5.
Could the order of reactors mean something? Like a secret code maybe?
Can't help wondering how big Avalanche actually is.
Who's to say they don't have people in Sector 7 hiding right under our noses?
Someone certainly dresses the part of division director.
Hell yeah! That's Scarlet for you. Climbing that corporate ladder in a skin-tight dress and heart-piercing heels!
I dunno, she kinda freaks me out. You saw that interview on TV just now, right?
How she talked down to the cameraman like he was trash? I love it!
Oh, well, if that's what you're into... To each their own?
Y'know what might be a good idea? Replicatin' that merc's weapon.
Wait, you don't mean that ridiculous sword, do you?
That's the one. It'll sell like gangbusters!
Okay, sure, it looks kinda cool, but let's not kid ourselves─no one'd ever buy it.
Ah, you don't mean that.
Sure I do. Thing would be way too heavy. Who the hell you think's gonna be able to swing it?
Hey, do you remember the last time we went out for drinks, how we were swapping war stories and stuff?
Not this again. We get it, ya killed a buncha Wutaians.
Damn straight I did! But that's not it─you remember how that Zhijie guy got all up in my face?
Yeah, probably because he was sick of all your goddamn bragging.
But he was real angry. Though I suppose it coulda been the booze.
Well, we don't know his story, do we? Maybe the war did a real number on him.
Like, he could've lost his family or whatever?
Aw, don't say that. Now I feel like an asshole!
I took a page outta Biggs' book and decided to clean up a bit.
If we all channeled our inner Biggs, we'd have the undercity sparkling like the plate in no time.
Givin' the slums a makeover? I like it!
Y'know, maybe we oughta get Biggs in on the action next time.
I heard some talk about how platies might come looking to take refuge down here once the trains're running again.
And that's all it is is talk. Like hell those fancy bastards'd slum it down here.
It's unlikely, yeah, but not impossible.
Plus, it's better to be safe than sorry. We should stock up on provisions.
What's the point? We'll have more food'n we know what to do with when the trains're up again.
Bomb one reactor, bomb 'em all─whatever. Makes no difference down here.
Undercity hardly uses any power, true.
Thing is, platies are always gonna get their fill. If anyone's gonna starve, it's us.
Ugh, I hate that you're right.
Look, a moogle!
Kupo kupo!
Wonder if that kitty's gonna come around today.
Here kitty kitty!
Are you pretending to be a moogle?
Shhh, I can't hear.
Did you come for story-time, too?
Wanna listen too? You can sit next to me!
Your hat's real cute!
Storytime is my favorite.
Hi, moogle! You want a piece of bread, too?
Sure wish Stamp was my dog.
It's a moogle!
What does "loyal" mean?
Moogle lady, you're in the way.
I can't see. Move.
Hi there, moogle! Are you here for the story?
data.speaker: Betty

data.text: I bet you like Stamp, too, huh!
data.speaker: Betty

data.text: Stamp's the best dog in the whole wide world.
data.speaker: Betty

data.text: Go all out, go all out, little Stamp. You've got so much courage and everybody thinks you're swell.
data.speaker: Betty

data.text: It'd be nice if Marlene was here.
data.speaker: Betty

data.text: Everyone loves Stamp─even cats!
data.speaker: Betty

data.text: Stamp's so cute. I just love him!
data.speaker: Betty

data.text: Tell me you've seen that new guy around. I could stare at him for hours!
Guessing you mean the merc?
The one with the sword? Nope, that's yesterday's news. This hottie's got a staff!
That's him! That's the guy!
What? Where?
The one with the staff. Mm, just look at those muscles!
What d'you think happened?
I have no idea. I just hope my future husband's alright.
Even if your "future husband" is with Avalanche?
Hey, don't even joke about that.
Where the hell'd all these pigeons come from?
Who freakin' knows.
Someone's gotta be feeding them...
Wherever they came from, I am over cleaning up their poo.
Should we take it up with the neighborhood watch?
Could do, but...I think I might miss 'em if they go. They're kinda cute.
What're all these troopers doin' here?
Turning that house upside down by the looks of it...
For the time being, we've decided to disband the Friends of Freshness.
Seriously?
If you're angry, blame me. This was my decision.
But sir!
There are more important things to worry about than bad smells. War, for one.
I want you all to know our work doesn't end here─never will. Not till our town's clean again.
We won't forget freshness...or each other.
I certainly hope not.
I'm under way too much stress. First work, then bills, and now this? C'mon.
Well that explains the gray hairs.
Wow, thanks.
Starting to think we should leave Midgar before shit hits the fan.
And go where? Do what? I wouldn't even know where to begin.
We're playing spies!
I'm a ninja from Wutai!
Hut hut hah!
Get out here, Avalanche!
Where ya hiding!?
Hey! You with Avalanche?
Nooo! I'm the merc!
You can't be the merc. I'm the merc!
Fine. We'll play for it. Winner gets to be him.
Your friendly neighborhood merc is here!
It's over, Avalanche! Give up while you still can!
Hey...do you think he's gonna be okay?
Who? The "cool" kid from Sector 5?
Yeah... I'm really worried.
Naw, he'll prob'ly be a refu...referee!
Then we'll be able to play together!
Yes? Oh, would you like to volunteer at the children's center? We're always in need of helping hands.
Kids could use an older sister to look up to.
The truth is...most of the children here are orphans. A lot of them lost their parents in the war.
Can't believe history's about to repeat itself.
Look at 'em. Buncha kids.
Me? I'm a lone wolf.
Do you live at Étoile? Like Jessie does?
When I'm all grown up, I'm gonna live there, too!
Is it true? Is Jessie really hurt!?
Well, she was, but she's doing a lot better now.
That's good.
You think she hurt herself during rehearsals, maybe?
Could've been a stunt gone wrong.
Oh yeah! That'd explain all the shooting earlier.
Hey, you know Nayo?
Uh... Glasses? Pretty?
Yep, that's her alright!
Anyway, don't tell him I said this, but my brother's crazy about her─head over heels.
Really?
Found this super-sappy love letter addressed to her while I was cleaning.
Wait, wait, wait. You read the letter?
Not on purpose! It was just there!
But now what? I'm in too deep; I have to help him out, right?
What you have to do is step back.
Um, miss? What's Wutai?
Are they the bad guys?
Hmmm, well, it's a little complicated.
Let's go somewhere cool for our honeymoon.
Sounds fun! Where should we go?
Hmmm, how 'bout Sector 4?
What? We're not even gonna get outta Midgar?
No way. Mom says the wasteland's filled with monsters.
But it's our honeymoon! We gotta think bigger! How about Wutai? Sound good?
Beats me. Never seen anywhere outside of the city.
That's why we should go! C'mon, you know you wanna!
It'll be romantic!
You're not gonna believe this, but you know that new tenant who just moved in? Wutaian.
What, like some kinda spy or something?
Dunno, but I might report them to the watch.
"A timely alarm keeps neighbors from harm," am I right?
Yeah. It's our duty to protect our fellow citizens.
Course they'd use this bullshit as a reason to come down on us. Any excuse to get rid of us "undesirables."
We're gettin' hauled off to the frontlines, you'll see.
Can't pull the wool over my eyes.
I see this for what it is: a Shinra plot. They're tryin'a wipe out the undercity.
If I go to war, there's no way I'd leave him behind.
He'd probably just run off, but okay....
My partner and I were thinking about going to the Leaf House tomorrow.
Really? To adopt?
That's the plan. Then after we get back, I was gonna pop the question.
Is now the best time?
Don't think there's any better time, personally.
Well, if you're sure... Congrats, I guess.
Hey, Mom, shouldn't we be doing something to help?
The best way to help is to stay strong and carry on.
Hearts are like shirts─no use if they're torn. We can't let rumors get to us.
Got any moogle hats like the one that girl's wearing?
Ummm...no, sorry.
How've things been? Business as usual?
Yep! A perk of only buying from undercity designers.
Wait a sec. Didn't you tell me all this stuff was made on the plate?
You see that? Moogle chic.
Oh wow, it's certainly a...look. More power to her!
I'm feeling adventurous. Wanna wear something crazy!
Bring a little color into people's lives!
Right on! Fashion's gonna save this town!
Don't you have enough clothes?
Excuse you? There's no such thing.
But how 'bout saving some of that money for food?

Would you stop worrying?
We have plenty of food.
Really?
Yes, really! Now, fashion first, food later!
Stuck on the ground floor again.
Might as well check in with the neighborhood's resident cat whisperer.
Hey there kitties, glad to see you're having a good day.
Gotta be tough loving the thing you're allegric to...
And just who're you? Never seen your face around here before.
You done gawking yet?
Seriously, what are you staring at? Do people not do laundry where you come from?
Alright! This oughta help pad the wallet a bit.
Who knew spreading rumors about Wutai could be so lucrative? We're gonna be rich!
Just gotta hope Avalanche doesn't go soft on us.
C'mon, you guys! Keep doing what you do and we'll reap the rewards!
On second thought, isn't what we're doing a little─I dunno─shitty?
What's it matter? Job's a job.
You supposed to be a moogle?
Ah, I getcha. Costume party, right?
Is it true there was a moogle here?
I swear, Midgar's on a one-way road to ruin.
Did you make that yourself?
Oh my god, it's so cute.
I'm calling it: the next big trend is "moogle mode."
Hey, anyone know where you can get a moogle hat around here?
Look! A moogle!
Are you, like, Moggie's sister?
Did you hear? A moogle came to town!
I heard there was another explosion at a reactor!
Ooh! A moogle hat!
I love moogles too, kupo!
When I get home, I'm gonna ask my mom to make me a moogle hat!
Everybody's looking for Avalanche... Oh! Those're the bad guys.
What's this about that, uh, "Fort Condor" game?
Heard you're neck deep in this Fort Condor stuff.
Keep at it, kid!
The...The Condor Queen! Please, can I shake your hand?
Man, just my luck. Dumb game's sold out everywhere...
Word is there's a new, up-'n'-coming game master. Came outta nowhere!
It true some teenager's kickin' ass and takin' names at Fort Condor?
So Fort Condor's finally made it down to the undercity?
Some girl's takin' the scene by storm─knockin' players out left and right!
Holy shit, it's you! You're the one everyone's talking about: the next Fort Condor master!
Heard there's some Fort Condor "grandmaster" somewhere in the city.
Keep racking up those wins and you'll be takin' on the grandmaster soon!
Bet ya got what it takes to knock the grandmaster off of their throne!
There she is, the new grandmaster herself! You ever need a cheerleader, I'm your man!
You ever hear of that, uh, "Fort Condor" game?
Huh, thought that game was a total boy's club. Love that you proved 'em wrong!
Maybe I should give it a whirl.
Oh, Yuffie!
Guess what? I'm a player now, too! All thanks to you, ya badass.
I only just got into the whole Fort Condor thing.
Say, you're really big into that scene, right?
We should play each other sometime!
Oh, I'd kill to be even half as good at this game as you are, Yuffie!
Teach me how. Please!
This game really took off. Kinda surprised.
People've been talking, saying you're not half bad at this Fort Condor stuff.
Everyone's going on about how you're, like, the master of Fort Condor! You must be real good!
So, who do you think the grandmaster is?
Their identity is a total mystery─nobody knows who they are!
A match between the grandmaster and the Condor Queen!? My god, I'd die!
You're incredible! The best of the best, the player of players!
Stay back.
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: That's close enough.
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: You hear me?
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: C'mon, keep it moving.
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: What happened here?
Someone have a few too many?
I dunno, if Shinra's already here...
Don't think it was Avalanche, do ya?
Hey, weren't Polk and his friends living there?
You don't think he's with Avalanche, do you?
Was there an accident?
This couldn't be related to the reactors, could it?
Shinra just showed up out of nowhere.
Was that really Avalanche's base? No...
What are officers doing at Nayo's place?
God, I hope everything's alright.
You see that man there? He's definitely with SOLDIER.
What? Why would a SOLDIER be here?
How cool. I've never seen a SOLDIER up close before!
Wow, that Shinra guy really wants to find his friend.
Stranger danger!
I don't think I wanna be his friend...
